mapper.select: SELECT member_id,password,name,email,phone,auth,TO_CHAR(join_date, 'yyyy-MM-dd') AS joinDate,birth_date FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId}

SELECT member_id AS memberId, password, name, email, phone, auth, TO_CHAR(join_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS joinDate, birth_date AS birthDate FROM member WHERE member_id = #{memberId} AND password = #{password}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO member ( member_id, password, name, email, phone, auth, join_date, birth_date ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{password}, #{name}, #{email}, #{phone}, 'USER', SYSDATE, #{birthDate} )
